alternative_parents.description: Organometallic compounds hat containing a metal atom substituted by on or more aryl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Metal aryls

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing the formazan group with the formula R1(R2)NN=CHN=NR3 (R1,R2,R3=H, alkyl, or aryl).
alternative_parents.name: Formazans

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of diazene(diimide), HN=NH, wherein both hydrogens are substituted by hydrocarbyl groups, e.g. PhN=NPh azobenzene or diphenyldiazene.
alternative_parents.name: Azo compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organosulfur compounds a sulfenyl group with the general formula RS (R = organyl).
alternative_parents.name: Sulfenyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic 1,3-dipolar compounds with the general structure  X#N+-Z- <-> X-=N+=Z <-> X-=N-Z+ <-> X-N=Z (X = C or O, Z = C, N, or O).
alternative_parents.name: Propargyl-type 1,3-dipolar organic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic salt compounds containing a transition metal atom in its ionic form.
alternative_parents.name: Organic transition metal salts

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an N-Alkylidene derivative of hydrazine. They have the generic structure RNN=C(R')R\" (R,R',R\"= H or organyl group).
alternative_parents.name: Hydrazones

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and mercury atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organomercurial compounds

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.
class.name: Benzene and substituted derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as phenylhydrazines. These are compounds containing a phenylhydrazide moiety, which consists of a hydrazide substituent attached to a phenyl group.

direct_parent.description: Compounds containing a phenylhydrazide moiety, which consists of a hydrazide substituent attached to a phenyl group.
direct_parent.name: Phenylhydrazines

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Compounds containing a phenylhydrazide moiety, which consists of a hydrazide substituent attached to a phenyl group.
subclass.name: Phenylhydrazines

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
